channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Le silence complice d’Apple et Google face aux dérives de Grok : 28 organisations passent à l’attaque pour dénoncer ce deux poids, deux mesures
item.description: Si n'importe quel développeur indépendant laissait son IA générer des images pédopornographiques, son application serait supprimée en une heure. Pourtant, X est toujours là. Une coalition de 28 organisations vient d'envoyer une lettre vitriolée à Apple et Google pour dénoncer ce deux poids, deux mesures.

item.title: ChatGPT saved me from a roadside nightmare — this is exactly what we should be using AI for, not for replacing creatives
item.description: A simple dashboard photo shows how AI can solve real-world problems in seconds — without drama, disruption, or embarrassment.

item.title: RAM price hikes: the latest on the global memory shortage
item.description: Random access memory, or RAM, is in just about every piece of technology we use. But it’s also the technology that AI companies like OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and Meta are using to power the servers in their massive data centers. Now, the world’s biggest memory makers — Samsung, SK Hynix, and Micron — are taking […]

item.title: Xiaomi déstocke ses meilleurs produits Tech durant la 2e démarque des soldes
item.description: Xiaomi frappe fort pour la deuxième démarque des soldes ! La marque multiplie les bons plans sur l’ensemble de son catalogue. Et bonne nouvelle : le tout nouveau Redmi Note 15 5G profite lui aussi d’une belle réduction. Découvrez sans attendre les offres les plus intéressantes !

item.title: Le Phone (3a) Lite déjà soldé : le dernier smartphone entrée de gamme de Nothing séduit avec son écran AMOLED 120 Hz et son design toujours atypique
item.description: Lancé fin octobre, le Nothing Phone (3a) Lite est un smartphone d'entrée de gamme vendu 249,99 euros, mais à retrouver à 209,99 euros en ce moment pour les soldes d'hiver sur Boulanger.

item.title: Marvel Rivals Season 6 is going to make sure I grind every single hero thanks to the new Hero Proficiency update
item.description: Marvel Rivals Season 6 arrives tomorrow, and it's looking to be one of my favorite updates so far, thanks to the new Hero Proficiency overhaul.

item.title: 11 Best Smartwatches (2026): Apple, Wear OS, Hybrid & Kids’ Watches
item.description: These WIRED-tested wearables reduce your reliance on a phone while keeping you connected.

item.title: OpenAI quietly rolls out a dedicated ChatGPT translation tool
item.description: OpenAI has debuted a dedicated ChatGPT-powered translation tool. While folks have been using the main chatbot for translation for some time, you can now find ChatGPT Translate on its own webpage, as Android Authority spotted. The tool can translate text, voice inputs and images into more than 50 languages in seconds, OpenAI says. There’s an automatic language detection function too.Most interestingly, ChatGPT Translate can rewrite the output to take various contexts and tones into account, much in the same way that more general text-generating AI tools can do. With a single tap, it can rewrite...

item.title: How people use ChatGPT – analysis of OpenAI’s first user study
item.description: Uncovering important nuances in frequency, motivation, and impact that you might not expect.

item.title: Massive breach leaks 45 million French records: demographic, healthcare, and financial data all leaked, here's what we know
item.description: Someone has been collecting data leaked in several breaches and putting it into an open database.

item.title: Spotify is getting a buck more expensive in February
item.description: Spotify is raising the prices for its premium subscriptions by $1 to $2 across the board, starting this February. Those are similar figures to the company’s last price hike in 2024. Subscribers across the US, Estonia and Latvia will soon receive an email, notifying them that they’ll be paying a larger amount for their February bill. The streaming service said it’s raising its prices occasionally to “reflect the value that Spotify delivers,” “to continue offering the best possible experience” and to “benefit artists.” It reported last year that it paid out $10 billion to music rights-holders in...

item.title: Pour s’offrir les services de Gemini, Apple a sorti le carnet de chèques
item.description: En attendant que ses propres modèles soient au niveau, Apple va donc faire appel à Google et à Gemini pour propulser les futures fonctions d'Apple Intelligence — à commencer par la nouvelle version de Siri. Cet accord donne du temps à la firme à la pomme, mais il va aussi lui coûter très cher.

item.title: Get up to $90 off reMarkable E Ink tablet bundles
item.description: E Ink tablets can provide the best of both worlds, giving you a similar tactile response to writing with pen and paper while also conveniently holding all of your digital files. reMarkable has a new year sale going on right now on its E Ink tablets, where you can save between $70 and $90 on a bundle, depending on the configuration you choose. For example, you can get the reMarkable 2 tablet with the Marker and Book Folio for $449, instead of the usual $568. The company also sells a newer stylus called Marker Plus that lets you erase by flipping it around just like a real pencil, but that will ...

item.title: Apple Notes could become my go-to life organizer with this big iOS 26.4 upgrade
item.description: A report claims that Apple Notes will get a Google Gemini-powered upgrade in iOS 26.4

item.title: "Workarounds are very limited" – VPNs stop working in Uganda as internet connectivity drops
item.description: After an initial spike in sign-ups, Proton VPN confirms its products have stopped working in Uganda as internet connectivity drastically dropped. Digital rights experts warn that workarounds are very limited

item.title: Euphoria season 3 was the last thing I thought I’d be excited for in 2026, but its action-packed trailer has hypnotized me like a moth to a flame
item.description: Euphoria season three's production delays have fueled my frustration with the HBO Max show, but the new trailer is blockbuster-worthy.

item.title: 9 Best Blind Boxes—Bag Charms, Plush Pendants, and More (2026)
item.description: In the market for a mystery treat? There’s more out there than Labubu. We bought a bunch of blind boxes online, and these are our favorites.

item.title: AirTags drop back down to $65 for a four-pack
item.description:
Apple keeps most of its product pricing on a tight leash, but we do see the company's AirTags go on sale pretty frequently. Another cost cut has come around for this item just in time for the holidays. Amazon is currently selling a four-pack of AirTags for $65. At a third off the regular cost, that price is pretty close to the record low discount of $63 we've seen for these Bluetooth trackers.
AirTags can be useful for people who travel frequently, helping you to keep track of essentials like your passport as well as a way to keep tabs on luggage while you're on the go. If you do purchase so...

item.title: Funko’s Latest Ultra-Niche Pop Is the Horrifying Pickle Dad From ‘It: Welcome to Derry’
item.description: Pucker up for this gloopy pile of Morris Bainbridge, arriving soon with new Pennywise and Periwinkle variants too.

item.title: FTC finalizes GM punishment over driver data sharing scandal
item.description: After reaching a proposed settlement last year, the FTC has banned General Motors from sharing specific consumer data with third parties, TechCrunch reported. The finalized order wraps up one of the more egregious cases of a corporation collecting its customers' data and then using it against them. Two years ago, the New York Times report released a report detailing how GM's OnStar "Smart Driver" program collected and sold detailed geolocation and driving behavior data to third parties, including data brokers. Those brokers in turn sold the data to insurance providers, which jacked up the rat...

item.title: Former CISA Director Jen Easterly Will Lead RSA Conference
item.description: The longtime cybersecurity professional says she’s taking the helm of the legacy security organization at “an inflection point” for tech and the world beyond.

item.title: Game of Thrones shows its playful side in A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
item.description: Though House of the Dragon tells a different story than Game of Thrones, there are enough tonal similarities to make the spinoff feel more like a remix of its predecessor than a show with its own distinct voice. That's part of what made it a little hard to get excited when HBO first announced that […]

item.title: How to watch Bahrain Masters 2026 online: free darts live streams, players, schedule
item.description: As Littler and co head to the Middle East for this two-day exhibition, here's how to watch free Bahrain Masters 2026 live streams online from anywhere in the world.

item.title: How to watch Love Island: All Stars season 3 — free streams from anywhere
item.description: A bumper six-week All Stars run brings back winners and fan favorites to the South Africa villa — here's how you can stream from anywhere.

item.title: Sony is promising a 'new form of listening' will arrive next week — and we think we know what it is
item.description: Sony is teasing a new product launch for next week, and tipsters are predicting that it's for the Sony LinkBuds Clip.

item.title: IKEA just launched a budget-friendly air fryer and microwave combo, and it might be the only cooking appliance your tiny kitchen needs
item.description: Imagine what you could do with all that extra space

item.title: How human motion is fueling the robot revolution — by teaching robots like Atlas to move in lifelike ways
item.description: Atlas and other humanoid robots are trained to learn complex human movements using VR and motion capture.

item.title: ‘Get Grok Gone’: Advocacy groups demand Apple and Google block X from app stores
item.description: X is awash with nonconsensual sexual deepfakes that blatantly violate Apple's and Google's policies, yet it and xAI's Grok remain on both companies' app stores. In open letters published Wednesday, a coalition of 28 advocacy groups, including women's organizations and tech watchdogs, are demanding CEOs Tim Cook and Sundar Pichai grow spines and evict them. […]...

item.title: Spotify is hiking prices again
item.description: The price of Spotify Premium is about to jump again in the US, marking its third price hike since 2023. Spotify announced that subscribers in the US, Estonia, and Latvia will be contacted about the updated pricing over the coming month. Individual Premium plans in the US will increase from $11.99 to $12.99 by the […]

item.title: Daredevil: Born Again season 2 will reveal something big about Jessica Jones — and confident Marvel fans claim that they know what it is
item.description: Marvel fans have a new big theory about Jessica Jones' return in the Disney+ show's second season.

item.title: ISS mission splashes down after medical issue
item.description: The SpaceX Dragon spacecraft carrying the Crew-11 astronauts has splashed down into the ocean after they left the ISS a month earlier than planned due a medical issue. It’s the first time NASA cut a mission short due to a medical concern. The agency didn’t name the crew member and their condition but stated that they were stable and that it wasn’t a case of medical evacuation. NASA merely decided to end the mission early out of an abundance of caution, because the ISS didn’t have the tools for a proper diagnosis. NASA astronauts Mike Fincke and Zena Cardman, JAXA’s Kimiya Yui and Russian cos...

item.title: Making Funny ‘Fallout 4’ Mods Is Way Better Than Making ‘Good’ Fallout 4 Mods
item.description: Featuring flying toilet plungers, Lovecraftian NPCs, and a murderous animated cutout of Todd Howard.

item.title: What Is VO2 Max? Here’s What You Need to Know About the Longevity Metric (2026)
item.description: VO2 max can predict cardiorespiratory health and longevity, but only if you understand what the number can and can’t tell you.

item.title: Crew-11 vient de rentrer sur Terre plus tôt que prévu, une première dans l’histoire de l’ISS
item.description: La mission Crew-11 s'est achevée de manière précipitée après le signalement d'un membre d'équipage malade. Les quatre astronautes sont arrivés sur Terre ce matin en bonne santé apparente et aucun souci n'est à signaler.

item.title: After Italy, WhatsApp excludes Brazil from rival chatbot ban
item.description: WhatsApp is allowing AI providers to continue offering their chatbots to users in Brazil, days after the country's competition agency ordered the company to suspend its new policy that bars third-party, general-purpose chatbots from the app.

item.title: Pax8 accidentally exposes partner data - 1,800 MSPs have customer info and licensing details exposed
item.description: A Pax8 employee sent an email with the wrong attachment to roughly 40 recipients.

item.title: Rockstar court representative says studio fired GTA 6 developers for discussing a 'top secret' 32-player online mode in private Discord, which it was 'gravely concerned' to have discovered
item.description: New court documents reveal that Rockstar fired the 30+ GTA 6 developers in October 2025 for allegedly discussing a 32-player online mode in a private Discord channel.

item.title: Galaxy AI payant en 2026 ? Samsung a discrètement changé les règles en octobre
item.description: C’est la fin officielle de l'incertitude. Alors que l'échéance de fin 2025 inquiétait, Samsung a mis à jour ses conditions d'utilisation. L'IA reste gratuite, et en France, c'est acté depuis l'automne.

item.title: I was ready to buy Ricoh’s incredibly niche black-and-white compact camera — but then I saw the price and it’s an absolute dealbreaker
item.description: Ricoh unveils its first black-and-white only camera in its GR series of premium digital compacts – the GR IV Monochrome, which is otherwise essentially identical to the GR IV

item.title: They Built a Full-Sized Boat for Guillermo del Toro’s ‘Frankenstein’
item.description: See how it went down in this new video about the Netflix film starring Oscar Isaac and Jacob Elordi.

item.title: Hundreds of Millions of Audio Devices Need a Patch to Prevent Wireless Hacking and Tracking
item.description: Flaws in how 17 models of headphones and speakers use Google’s one-tap Fast Pair Bluetooth protocol have left devices open to eavesdroppers and stalkers.

item.title: Livestream: Welcome to the Chinese Century
item.description: Join our livestream—and pose a question to WIRED’s panel of experts—on China’s dominance, influence, and how it is rewriting the future.

item.title: The Tea App Is Back With a New Website
item.description: Months after major data leaks, the app where women leave Yelp-style reviews about men is relaunching with a new website. It’s not back on iOS, but the Android app has new AI features.

item.title: All the news that’s fit to WhatsApp
item.description: The WeChat channel 纽约移民记事网Documented (or the New York Immigrant Chronicle) is part newsfeed and part public service. The channel, run by the nonprofit newsroom Documented NYC, is filled with local news for Chinese speakers in New York: stories about healthcare and immigration arrests, but also information on local events like toy giveaways, places where families […]...

item.title: Indian SpaceX rival EtherealX hits 5x valuation as it readies engine tests
item.description: EtherealX is ramping engine tests and building a 150-acre rocket campus in India as it targets a 2027 launch mission.

item.title: This old Pennsylvania coal town could get a reboot from AI
item.description: At its peak, the Homer City power plant employed hundreds of people and could deploy enough to power 2 million homes. As the September evening inched along, the line of residents waiting their turn for the microphone held steady. Filing down the auditorium aisles at the Indiana University of Pennsylvania, they were armed with questions about a new gas plant slated for their community....

item.title: Amazon slashes the price of the Blink Mini to a ridiculously low £9.99
item.description: The Blink Mini is a simple to use security camera that's perfect if you want to keep an eye on anything happening at home – and it's now down to a super-low price on Amazon.

item.title: Unable to access Microsoft Cloud PC? This could be why - and a fix is on the way
item.description: Microsoft says it's aware of a Microsoft 365 Cloud PC issue with the latest Windows 10 and Windows 11 builds.
